text: Alysicarpus naikianus is a herb in the legume family Fabaceae, native to India. ==Distribution and habitat== Alysicarpus naikianus is native to Gujarat, Maharashtra, Goa, Karnataka and Kerala. Its habitat is in shrubland, grassland and along roadsides, from sea level to altitude. ==References== naikianus Category:Flora of India (region) Category:Plants described in 1999
title: Alysicarpus naikianus
